NRF.name: Network Repository Function
NRF.description: NRF is the foundation of 5G SBA - no dependencies required
criticalFor: All other NFs require NRF for registration and discovery

AMF.name: Access and Mobility Management Function
AMF.description: AMF requires NRF for registration. AUSF and UDM needed for authentication.
startupChecks: Verify UDM connectivity for subscription data

NO_NRF.message: Cannot register with NRF - NRF not found in topology
NO_NRF.impact: AMF cannot function without NRF registration
NO_NRF.resolution: Add NRF to topology and create connection

NO_AUSF.message: AUSF not available - UE authentication will fail
NO_AUSF.impact: Cannot authenticate UEs, registration requests will fail
NO_AUSF.resolution: Add AUSF and connect to AMF

NO_UDM.message: UDM not available - Cannot retrieve subscription data
NO_UDM.impact: Cannot fetch UE context, registration incomplete
NO_UDM.resolution: Add UDM and connect to AMF

SMF.name: Session Management Function
SMF.description: SMF requires NRF for registration. UPF essential for data sessions.
startupChecks: Discover available UPF instances via NRF
Verify UDM connectivity for subscription data

NO_UPF.message: No UPF instances available - Cannot establish PDU sessions
NO_UPF.impact: Cannot create data sessions for UEs
NO_UPF.resolution: Add UPF and connect to SMF

NO_PCF.message: PCF not available - Using default policies
NO_PCF.impact: Cannot apply dynamic policies, using defaults
NO_PCF.resolution: Add PCF for dynamic policy control

UPF.name: User Plane Function
UPF.description: UPF requires NRF for registration. SMF controls UPF via N4 interface.
startupChecks: Register with NRF as UPF instance

NO_NRF.impact: UPF cannot be discovered by SMF

AUSF.name: Authentication Server Function
AUSF.description: AUSF requires UDM to retrieve authentication credentials

NO_UDM.message: UDM not available - Cannot retrieve authentication data
NO_UDM.resolution: Add UDM and connect to AUSF

UDM.name: Unified Data Management
UDM.description: UDM stores subscription data and authentication credentials

NO_NRF.impact: UDM cannot be discovered by other NFs

PCF.name: Policy Control Function
PCF.description: PCF provides policy rules for SMF and AMF
startupChecks: Verify UDM connectivity for subscriber policies

NSSF.name: Network Slice Selection Function
NSSF.description: NSSF selects appropriate network slice for UE

UDR.name: Unified Data Repository
UDR.description: UDR exposes network capabilities to external applications

gNB.name: Next Generation NodeB
gNB.description: gNB requires AMF for control plane and UPF for user plane

NO_AMF.message: Cannot establish N2 connection - AMF not found
NO_AMF.impact: gNB cannot handle UE registrations without AMF
NO_AMF.resolution: Add AMF to topology and create N2 connection

NO_UPF.message: Cannot establish N3 connection - UPF not found
NO_UPF.impact: gNB cannot forward user data without UPF
NO_UPF.resolution: Add UPF to topology and create N3 connection

UE.name: User Equipment
UE.description: UE requires gNB for network access

NO_gNB.message: No gNB found - Cannot access network
NO_gNB.resolution: Add gNB to topology and create radio connection

NO_NETWORK.message: gNB found but network not ready (AMF/UPF missing)
NO_NETWORK.resolution: Ensure complete 5G core network is deployed

MySQL.name: MySQL Database
MySQL.description: MySQL is a standalone database, typically connected to UDM/UDR
